properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:14AM CST until January 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Illinois...

Vermilion River at Pontiac affecting Livingston County
Vermilion River near Leonore affecting La Salle County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Vermilion River at Pontiac, or from Near Pontiac downstream to
IL-23 near Streator.
* from Sunday morning to late Monday night.
* At  945 AM Friday the stage was 3.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by late Sunday morning and
crest near 15.0 feet by Sunday evening.
* Impact...At 15.0 feet...Low-lying residences threatened between Mill
Street and Chautauqua Park in Pontiac. IL-116 threatened east and
west of Pontiac.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
